product_name: GSI Outdoors Bugaboo Base Camper Cookset - Large
long_description: Whip up large meals to satisfy the hunger of a group of hikers with the GSI Bugaboo Base Camper cookset. Set includes a 3-liter pot with lid, a 5-liter pot with lid, a 9-in. frypan, a cutting board, a folding pot gripper and a stuff sack. Bugaboo-series cookware features a durable and attractively painted finish that protects the aluminum core from abrasion and oxidation. Teflon(R) Classic nonstick cooking surface on the pots and frypan speeds cleanup and resists scratches. BPA-free nylon lids are lightweight and feature integrated strainers ideal for use with pasta and steamed vegetables; flip-up tabs on tops of lids make for easy lid removal. Included cutting board is rugged enough to handle slicing and dicing by serious campground chefs; cutting board is dished on 1 side and flat on the other. Cutting board nests between pots to reduce clatter during transport. 5-liter pot features silicone-coated bail handles for a secure grasp while cooking up large meals. Included folding pot gripper locks to and removes easily from exterior bracket on the 3-liter pot and the frypan; gripper design prevents scratching of interior surface. GSI Bugaboo Base Camper cookset includes a mesh storage sack.
short_description: Whip up large meals to satisfy the hunger of a group of hikers with the GSI Bugaboo Base Camper cookset.
